title: Video: Amy Holford – Sunflower (The Amazing Sessions)
content: Filmed at the fantastic Evolution Emerging event earlier in the year, this stunning session comes courtesy of Amazing Radio, featuring Amy Holford, the North East’s newest seductive songstress. Set against the backdrop of Blank Studios, it’s beautifully shot and magically performed by Holford. A song written for her grandad, and showcasing her delicate yet immensely powerful vocals, Sunflower truly demonstrates the splendid talent this young songwriter possesses.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
